#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       string a;
       char x;
       int count=0;
       int length;
       
       getline(cin,a);
       cin >> x;
       
       length = a.length();
       
       for(int i=0;i<length;i++)
         if(a[i] == x)
           count++;
         
       cout << count << endl;
       
       return 0;
       }
